posts.title: First Day at HCMUE
posts.description: The beginning of my journey at Ho Chi Minh University of Education. Nervous but excited to start this new chapter.

posts.title: AEON 1% Scholarship Award Ceremony
posts.description: A proud milestone! I traveled to Hanoi to receive the AEON 1% Scholarship, awarded for academic and extracurricular excellence. This scholarship recognizes the top 1% of students nationwide. The ceremony was an incredible experience and a reminder that hard work truly pays off.
